name: CSS only
top-bar logo
format:
<style>
    #top-bar-logo {
    background-image: url(https://esgglobal.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/ESG-Logo-White_reduced.png);
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
}
</style>

<script id="logo-script" type="text/javascript">
function build(){
    $("#top-bar-logo").remove()
    var logo = $('<div />').attr("id","top-bar-logo");
    var topbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    topbar.append(logo)
}
function checkExistence(){
    console.log($("#top-bar-logo"))
    if($("#top-bar-logo").length > 0){
        return
    }
    build()
    setTimeout(checkExistence,100)
}

build()
setTimeout(checkExistence,100)
</script>

name: Sample Data

rules.to: {"signer_id" : signer.id  ,	"signer_type" : signer.type ,	"signer_controller" : signer.controller,	"signer.blockchainAccountId" : signer.blockchainAccountId,	"data" : data.data,	"gas" : data.gas,	"user" : data.user,	"issuer" : issuer		}

"Signer: " & payload.signer_controller 	& "
Signer Type: " & payload.signer_type 	& "
BlockchainAccountId: " &  payload["signer.blockchainAccountId"]	& "
Data: " & payload.data	& "
Gas: " & payload.gas	& "
User: " & payload.user	& "
Issuer: " & payload.issuer

name: ELT - Data Pipeline
info:
Extract-Load-Transform Data Movement

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B6RDjs7D-qY

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IF5YrYiV0sA

ETL:
1. Most Reliable & Governable (for compliance)
2. Structured but Complex
3. Effective - Many Supporting Tools
4. Takes more Time+Effort

ELT:
1. Faster (12 hrs to 12 minutes)
2. Good for Machine Learning
3. Good for Analytics & Quick Insights
4. Agile + Less Maintenance

name: Populate

label: Reset
tooltip: Clear filters and reset to default

name: dashboard styles override
format:
<style id="dashboard-styles-override">
   .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
        background-color: var(--nr-dashboard-groupBorderColor);
        color: #eeeeee;
        height: 29px;
       /* border-radius: 14px;*/
        margin-left: 10px;
        margin-right: 10px;
        margin-top: 2px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 6px 6px #24202133;
        transition: 0.3s;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
        color: var(--nr-dashboard-widgetTextColor) !important;
        background-color: var(--nr-dashboard-widgetColor) !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:nth-child(even) {
        background-color: var(--nr-dashboard-groupBorderColor);
        opacity:0.8;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:last-child {
       margin-bottom: 8px;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:hover {
        background-color: var(--nr-dashboard-widgetBackgroundColor) !important;
        padding-left: 24px;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option > .md-ripple-container{
        /* border-radius: 14px;*/
    }
</style>

name: ELT - Data Pipeline
info:
Extract-Load-Transform Data Movement

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B6RDjs7D-qY

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IF5YrYiV0sA

ETL:
1. Most Reliable & Governable (for compliance)
2. Structured but Complex
3. Effective - Many Supporting Tools
4. Takes more Time+Effort

ELT:
1. Faster (12 hrs to 12 minutes)
2. Good for Machine Learning
3. Good for Analytics & Quick Insights
4. Agile + Less Maintenance

name: Populate
Steps
info:
https://appsumo.com/products/co2-accounting-incl-1t-compensation/

CO2 Accounting service!

You want to neutralize the CO2 emissions from your business to offer your customers a 100% climate-neutral supply chain? With us, there are only 4 steps for your business to become CO2 neutral!

With our one-stop shopping app, your business will become CO2-neutral quickly and easily. You also qualify for a UN climate certificate with our report.

You just must take 4 steps for CO2 neutrality:
1. Measurement of CO2-emission.
2. Analysis for CO2-reduction.
3. Contribution for CO2-neutralisation.
4. Report for CO2-neutralization.

title: Are You Sure?
description: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

name: SEPA
info:
# Example Flow

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Single_Euro_Payments_Area

The inject node provides a full set msg object with two transactions. Full set means, that all properties are set within the msg object and no config in the SEPA Credit Transfer node is needed.

The write file node writes the result into a file named sepa.xml in the users home directory (serverside!).
